metadata.title: T-Wave Source Location Retrieval (PMEL Vents)

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL), Vents Program

metadata.description: Provides earthquake location data using T-Wave sources locations derived from the U.S. Navy's Sound Surveillance System (SOSUS) for the N.E. Pacific Ocean especially Juan de Fuca Ridge area starting Year 1991 Julian Day 240 21:11:33.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To monitor the global ocean through underwater acoustics.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
